articles.title: Nepal: Plane with 19 passengers, including 4 Indians, onboard loses contact
articles.description: A Nepal flight carrying 19 passengers, flying from Pokhara to Jomsom at 9:55am, has lost contact with officials. The missing aircraft was hosting 4 Indian and 3 Japanese nationals.
articles.content: A Nepal flight carrying 19 passengers, flying from Pokhara to Jomsom at 9:55am, has lost contact with officials. The missing aircraft was hosting 4 Indian and 3 Japanese nationals.
